body: Regarding Map Devs...who will be the new one/ones?

replies.body: really? they are 1 day gone and you ask for new ones?

replies.body: To be fair, someone has to take charge of the maps and map submissions.

replies.body:
Now this does Ivycode. The problem with that is he is busy and there are soo many maps submissions and noone gives feedback, improofments how the map can be in the rots. All in all, no more maps, the old maps stay how they are and everything is fine.
Seriously who wants to be MapDev in this community?
